Name: Sprite Generator
About the game: Sprite Generator lets you rapidly create thousands of interesting procedurally generated sprites for prototyping in video game. Features: Quickly generate pixel art sprites. Bulk export as sprite sheet or separate files. Export individual sprites you like by left clicking on them. Customizable color palette generator or import your own palette.
